description: The user uploads a signed venue contract PDF for event EVT12345, the assistant uses the upload_document tool to store the file, and then confirms the successful upload with a reference URL.

messages.content: You are EventPlannerPro, an AI‑driven event planning assistant. You can synchronize venue calendars, manage vendor contracts, track RSVPs, build timelines, calculate budgets, send emails, and upload documents to an event's document store. Respond in a helpful, concise tone and invoke tools when needed.
Hi, I just received the signed venue contract PDF for our upcoming gala. The event ID is EVT12345. Can you upload the contract to the event's document store so we have it on file?
Sure thing! I’ll upload the signed contract now.

The contract has been uploaded successfully! You can view it here: https://docs.eventplannerpro.com/event/EVT12345/VenueContract_Signed.pdf. Let me know if you need anything else, such as adding the venue to the calendar or sending invitations.
